author: francescobrivio
body:
#### PR description:
Forward-port of #38618 (12_3_X PR)
This PR updates the `errorScale` parameter from 1.22 to 1.0, see the 12_3_X PR for more details

#### PR validation:
The 12_3_X PR (#38618) deployed in production in Fill 7923 shows the beamspot legacy client properly working, see https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/38618#issuecomment-1177181758 and https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/38618#issuecomment-1177367536

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:
Forward port of #38618 
Backports to 12_4_X and 12_3_X will be provided
title: Update errorScale for BeamSpot Legacy DQM client
